about_the_game:
🎲 Welcome to the ultimate fusion of strategy and luck! Dice TD is a thrilling tower defense game that puts a unique spin on the classic genre. Instead of traditional towers, you'll spawn and merge dice to defend against waves of relentless enemies emerging from mystical portals.

Maze it, till you make it


Spawn dozens of different dice and change the path of the incoming enemies. Build epic mazes to trap them all.

Portals, portals, everywhere...


As you progress, new portals will unlock, each bringing fresh challenges and enemies. Stay on your toes, adapt your strategy, and demonstrate your mastery over the board as you strive to close all the portals and save the realm from impending doom.

Merge Dice to defeat the enemies


Unlock new dice, choose the best kinds and build up your defenses. Develop ultimate combinations and merge your dice to increase their power and pip count, and unleash their mighty abilities.

Are you ready to roll the dice and defend against the forces threatening your realm? Embark on the adventure of a lifetime!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10, Windows 11
  • Processor: 2.6 GHz dual core or better
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated graphics card (opengl 3.0 support or higher)
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Dice TD is a board-themed tower defense game with fantasy dice, instead of towers. Merge your dice to increase their pips and powers. Defend your base from the incoming enemies and construct epic mazes to slow them down.
